snippet.title: Best Fiends FOREVER - Get your fingers ready!
snippet.description:
A first look at our cinematic ad which will be in movie theaters soon! 
Slap. Collect. Level Up. Repeat. 
Download the all-new and totally different Best Fiends game for FREE now! http://download.BestFiends.com/Forever  

Get ready for a very big adventure with very small heroes! The sequel to the award-sometimes-winning Best Fiends! But it's nothing like that game! Except that it's got the same lovable characters, and you're still beating up slugs. But it's a clicker adventure, which is different, and we think a lot of fun!

TRAVEL through the world of Minutia, defeating the bad guys!
SLAP, COLLECT & LEVEL UP pretty much everything in the game!
LEARN MATH trying to understand how much damage you're doing!
LOSE TOUCH with your family and friends!
RECOMMEND it to people you don't like!

Story: The Fiends finally made it to Mount Boom, only to be defeated and imprisoned yet again. Now it's time for YOU to turn the tables! Round up the old gang, level them up and defeat wave after wave of slugs as you make your way to the elusive villain behind the Slug Invasion!

With the help of the Fiends, and the awesome reckoning power of Mount Boom, and the magical souvenirs that boost your strength, and whatever new stuff we come up with down the line, you'll save the world in no time. And then realize there's more to this game than even that! And then hate us for making a game you can't stop playing!

And there's no energy limitations! Play it whenever you want, for as long as you want! Which is good, since you've obviously got some time on your hands if you bothered to read this far through the description. So get it already. Best Fiends FOREVER!

========================================================

COMMUNITY (connect from Best Fiends for FREE Diamonds!)
---------
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bestfiends
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/bestfiends
Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/bestfiends
Snapchat:  http://www.snapchat.com/add/bestfiends
VK:  https://vk.com/bestfiendsofficial
---------

FRIENDS of FIENDS 
---------

RoseEllenDix: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HdPe5iWJKO8
Alisha Marie: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qTSaPGG383s
Julien Bam:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MbHaR0Tp0Yc
Julienco:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jA8tPQSEECY
Tyler Oakley:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UxODkazpw98
TheEllenShow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hZ6tIie-XN4

---------
Best Fiends plushies, t-shirts and more:  http://amazon.com/bestfiends
---------
